meanings.definition: A public event at which stunt flying, skydiving, and other aerial displays are performed.
meanings.sent1: The airshow featured amazing stunts and skydiving performances.
meanings.sent2: I can't wait to attend the airshow this weekend and watch the planes in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The clown mistakenly thought the airshow was a circus in the air.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were like a mesmerizing airshow, captivating everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The airshow was a thrilling spectacle of flying acrobatics and daring maneuvers.

meanings.sent1: The pilot will airshow his skills in front of a large audience.
meanings.sent2: She trained for months to airshow at the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to airshow by jumping from the top of the bookshelf.
meanings.sent4: His speech was an airshow of charisma and confidence.
meanings.sent5: The magician will airshow his latest tricks at the magic convention.
